fa-tooltip/arrowPointAtCenter.description: Whether the arrow is pointed at the center of target

fa-tooltip/autoAdjustOverflow.description: Whether to adjust popup placement automatically when popup is off screen

fa-tooltip/defaultVisible.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible by default

fa-tooltip/getPopupContainer.description: The DOM container of the tip, the default behavior is to create a div element in body.

fa-tooltip/mouseEnterDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter

fa-tooltip/mouseLeaveDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

fa-tooltip/overlayClassName.description: Class name of the tooltip card

fa-tooltip/placement.description: The position of the tooltip relative to the target, which can be one of top left right bottom topLeft topRight bottomLeft bottomRight leftTop leftBottom rightTop rightBottom

fa-tooltip/visible.description: Whether the floating tooltip card is visible or not

fa-tooltip/align.description: this value will be merged into placement's config, please refer to the settings dom-align
